data.event: Santa Clara (/ˌsæntəˈklærə/) is a city in Santa Clara County, California, named after the Spanish mission that was established there in 1777.
Located 45 miles (72 km) southeast of San Francisco, the city was founded in 1777 and incorporated in 1852.
